name: Roboto (Orolock, CDplaya, Humane Tiger)
description:
You are helping a little robot to find its way out of an abondened factory building. Floating platforms, movable boxes and tricky jumps are needed to find a way through each level.

Furthermore, it is necessary to avoid certain dangers. Falling too deep or getting in contact with rain coming through the broken roof will kill your robot.

Luckily, there are ways to get around these dangers. The first 2 tutorial levels are teaching you everything you need to know.

Controls

R - Restart Level

A / D - Left / Right

SPACE - Jump

E - Interact

G - Pull Box 

       


The Team

Orolok - Programming (Unity)

CDPlaya - Music and Sound FX

Humane Tiger - Gameart (Pen, Brushes & Paper, Watercolor, Krita)
